storyInfo: A new round of games starts among the Famiglie, revolving around Texas's identity.

attributes.content: Sora, are you ready yet?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Stop rushing me!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Urgh... This dress is so tight!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You haven't been chubbing up on pizza behind my back, have you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What are you even talking about? I only had one extra slice last night!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora, suck it in!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hissssâ€”
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Alrighty! Perfect!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You're good.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Done? Come on out already and let me see!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Coming, coming.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wooooah, you look amazing!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You'n say that again. One purdy lady!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Heehee.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: *sigh*... If only Texas was here to see you too.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I knew you had it in ya though, Sora. Ya made it onstage here in Siracusa mighty quick.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: But of course~
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This time, 'La Morte di Texas' will be presented in multiple acts. We've already finished rehearsing the first one, and the opening night is the day after tomorrow!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If everything goes well, maybe she'll be the one looking for me, rather than the other way around~
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That could happen. Lemme think... Yeah, if it comes to that, I'm definitely gonna buy a pizza to slap her face around a bit.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Speakin' of Texas, I've been talkin' up the Bellone family. I hear tell things've been awful rough for 'em lately. Hope that ain't gettin' in her way.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: She's gonna be perfectly fine.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Most we'n do right now is keep the faith in her.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We oughta rest up before Sora's debut too.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I originally wanted to take a look around the city, but it feels like I've turned into Sora's bodyguard.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Bite me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But hey, I've eaten my weight in the free food at the theater. Hehe, their pizza's not half bad.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Things are probably only gonna get busier from here on out, so let's go for a walk.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey, did you hear...?
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: You're talking... Tex... right?
attributes.name: Meddlesome Actress

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Right, Texas... sentenced...
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: Ehh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Excuse me, did you just say something about Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yup, sure did. You interested?
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: What happened to Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: My boyfriend's with Famiglia Bellone, and I heard it from him.
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: You know how il Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici was killed a few days ago?
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: Apparently, they found the culprit.
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: The one who did it was the last of the Texas bloodline. I think her name was Cellinia or something?
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: No way!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They even decided on the court date. It's the day after tomorrow.
attributes.name: Cheery Actress

attributes.content: Signor Leontuzzo, we agreed on this meeting, but you've already pushed it back several times.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: My sincerest apologies, Signor Wallach, but I've had too much to deal with lately.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I hear you've already withdrawn a lot of your men from several areas previously under contention with other famiglie. I'm worried about you.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'm glad to see that you're alive and well.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: It's nothing major, just cutting our losses.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Haha, I'm quite fond of that prudent side of yours.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Don't worry, Famiglia Rossati has no interest in kicking a man when he's down.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But there is one problem that I must reluctantly bring up.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: It has to be about Texas.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: 'Cellinia Texas.' Is she back, and even one of your bodyguards?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Is it really her?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: What if I say yes?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We never knew she was alive this whole time.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Back then, it was my father who saved her.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I see, I see. This was the old don's handiwork.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The construction of the new city was, from the very beginning, because of the fate Salvadore shared with Siracusa. My father only hoped she could return to Siracusa to see the city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Such is Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Despite knowing full well the significance of the Texas name to Famiglia Rossati, you still invited her to come back so graciously.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Impressive. Truly impressive.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I, Wallach, can only offer my admiration.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Again with your jokes.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Jokes? How is any of this a joke?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: The news that Signorina Cellinia is still alive means a great deal to us Rossatis.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: No matter how the Bellones see it, we are in your debt.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Our two famiglie will see this new city built, hand-in-hand. What debt is there to speak of?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hahaha! Very good, I love it!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: By the looks of things, fratello, you've been waiting for me all this time.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So tell me, what is it you want?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Simpleâ€”
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: For the Rossatis to stay out of this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Oh? You want us to stand aside and watch the last Texas go down? That's not going to fly with the boss.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: After the trial is over, she'll be held in custody and you'll still be able to see her.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Just see her?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: She's our guest, but she could also be yours.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Alright, it's a deal!
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So this is when you decide to reveal Cellinia? That's certainly unexpected...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Was it Lavinia's idea? No... There's no way for her to know that Cellinia wasn't the murderer.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Knowing her, this isn't a decision she'd make.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Could Leon have convinced her?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Never mind. In any case, I didn't expect this card to get played.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri, what're we doin' now?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Time to rub out Cellinia?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Do you have any idea how many heavies she put down during the chaos that broke out seven years ago?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Butâ€”
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: An ambush, explosives, or a good, old-fashioned poisoning. We might have a way...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But don't forget to take into account whoever invited her back.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Whoever they might be, it undeniably was a clever move.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Now that things have come to this, we're forced to resort to more... brutal methods to put this trial on ice.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: At the end of the day, our goal is to plunge the city into chaos.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: From the very beginning, we've been here to provoke Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Now, all we're doing is taking another step forward.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Gotcha.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: If you ask me, I think there's another option.
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Whatever you're doing sounds like fun. Mind if I join in?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Director, did you hear the news about Texas?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I did, just now.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Do you have any clue what's going on behind the scenes?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I got the news from Judge Lavinia's own announcement.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Lavinia, the judge who helped me...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She... doesn't seem like the type to lie, but...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you going to postpone your debut?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Could you... please help me come up with something?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I at least... want to see her first.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And regardless of whether or not your debut can be pushed back...
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I want to know what happens when you do see her.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Signorina Sora, I remember you said you came to Siracusa with two friends to look for her.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You always believed in the woman you knew, that she was truly who you thought she was.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But now, you know her hidden past.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: You've been forced to learn that the woman you've been chasing might be an entirely different person.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Say you go see her. What then?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: What are you going to say to her, and what is she going to say to you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: If that's the way things are, then maybe it's all my own fault. Maybe I never knew her well enough.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Even if she was clearly keeping something from you?
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: That depends on her reason for doing it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Anyway, Mr. Bernardo, showbiz is a big melting pot, and I've met all kinds.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's way too hard to be the person you claim to be. At least, I don't think I can pull it off.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I always think to myself, one day I'm going to turn into someone I'm not.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So, I never expect it from other people.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Everybody has their secrets. I do, she does, and I'm sure you do too.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If she wants to keep her mask on until the very end, and that's the side she wants me to see, isn't that also genuine, in its own way?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Also, maybe I didn't express myself clearly enough.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm not looking for Texas so I can give her a piece of my mind. Not at all.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The four of us lived together in Lungmen for almost six years.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Six years, precious to me beyond words.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And I sincerely believe... they're just as precious to her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Still, she still left without saying goodbye.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Should I be upset over that?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm not. I'm worried sick about her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Exusiai and Croissant would say the same thing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's why we came to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If she's caught up in some trouble, then we're going to bail her out.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If the weight of her past is enough to make her crumble, we'll be there to share that burden with her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Through many plays, the fate of Famiglia Texas is known far and wide, even if the rumors of Cellinia's death were exaggerated.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Her past is likely much deeper than you can imagine.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But we haven't heard it from her, directly.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She has to tell us what she thinks herself.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Only then, if she still decides to part ways with us, after everything we've been through... Only then can I say goodbye without a weight on my heart.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Only if I try my best, can go move on without any regrets.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Well... I'd probably still have some regrets, but they wouldn't be that bad.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You speak with a great deal of wisdom, Signorina Sora.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: I'm just trying to come up with excuses for my bravado, that's all.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But I do feel much better after having talking to you about this.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You are right, though. If I went to see her right now, I don't think there's anything I'd be able to do for her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Actually, I was ready to agree to your request.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: After the trial, you will see her. I can promise you that.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Really?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But for the time being, you'll have to keep waiting.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Thank you so much! I have got to get ready first.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Haha.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I won't be there to see your debut in person.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Huh? You're not going to watch?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's right. I'm afraid I have something important to do that day.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: But, don't worry. I've already prepared the best possible stage for you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'd better get going, then.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: Bernardo walks over to the shelf and pulls out a book.
A legal codex wrapped in thorns.
He remains silent for a long time until finally, he places a call.
Demetri... tell her. Just say, I agreed.
attributes.name: Bernardo

attributes.content: With a boom, thunder surges outside the window.
It seems to augur the heavy rain about to come.
